info.author: Roger Ineichen, Projekt01 GmbH
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Zope Public License
info.description:
This package provides a mongodb grid based file implementation for Zope3.


=======
CHANGES
=======

3.0.0 (2018-04-24)
------------------

- feature: added skipMD5Check to ChunkWriter for skip the filemd5 hash check

- make it compatible with new mongo client setup in m01.mongo > 3.0.*. Because
  the connection pool factory concept is gone in m01.mongo

- ensure acknowledged file collection. Because with w=0, 'filemd5' might run
  before the final chunks are written.

- adjust test setup

- support pymongo >= 3.0.0 and use 3.0.0 as package version and reflect
  pymongo >= 3.0.0 compatibility


0.5.0 (2012-11-17)
------------------

- initial release
info.keywords: Zope3 z3c p01 m01 mongo file grid
info.name: m01.grid
info.summary: MongoDB grid file implementation for Zope3
info.html_description:
This package provides a mongodb grid based file implementation for Zope3.

CHANGES

3.0.0 (2018-04-24)

  • feature: added skipMD5Check to ChunkWriter for skip the filemd5 hash check
  • make it compatible with new mongo client setup in m01.mongo > 3.0.*. Because the connection pool factory concept is gone in m01.mongo
  • ensure acknowledged file collection. Because with w=0, ‘filemd5’ might run before the final chunks are written.
  • adjust test setup
  • support pymongo >= 3.0.0 and use 3.0.0 as package version and reflect pymongo >= 3.0.0 compatibility

0.5.0 (2012-11-17)

  • initial release
